thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Huahong jitong Smart System to swing to profit in FY 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Huahong jitong Smart System to swing to profit in FY 2017

organizations.name: shanghai huahong jitong smart system co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Shanghai Huahong jitong Smart System Co Ltd :
* Sees to swing to net profit at 3.6 million yuan to 6.6 million yuan in FY 2017 versus net loss at 28.9 million yuan year ago
* Says increase in profit from main business and non-operation revenue as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/TtKfnq
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
